biotools.summary: Database comprising more than 7000 peptide sequences known to bind class I and class II MHC molecules. The entries are compiled from published reports only. The database can be used to predict the immunogenicity of given peptide sequences.

bioschemas.name: SYFPEITHI
bioschemas.summary: Database comprising more than 7000 peptide sequences known to bind class I and class II MHC molecules. The entries are compiled from published reports only. The database can be used to predict the immunogenicity of given peptide sequences.
